name: 魂之大陆 Soultia
description:
Soultia is a sandbox construction battle game. With the traditional box sandbox features, it also has a very rich and powerful combat and equipment system.

Here, whether you are tired of building and want to fight, or if you are tired of fighting, you can build a house.
You can build a matchbox and concentrate on smashing the equipment, just to challenge one completely different ecosystem and grotesque;
Or slowly build your own warm nest, enjoy the spring, summer, autumn and winter of nature, the rain and snow, and the battle is not urgent.
It only takes 24 hours to break the customs. If you like to build, you will enjoy longer game time.

Everything in the game can be destroyed and built. In addition to the natural squares, there are hundreds of architectural blocks.

The game has 23 monsters and 3 monsters, 36 weapons, 10 hairstyles, 7 sets of fashion, 11 armor, dozens of accessories and mounts, and more than 300 architectural blocks.
Each set of hair, fashion and armor has 5 colors, you are free to choose what color you want to dye yourself.

Weapons can recast dozens of affixes and can be upgraded to +9 quality. When playing the blame, it may be easier to try to cast different affixes or upgrade weapons.

In addition, the game also has a unique casting sword system , each monster and old monster have a unique soul, each soul has a weapon attribute and soul skills.
After you get Soul Crystal, you can cast soul crystals, souls, ores into weapons on the weapon casting table. By adding different souls, your weapons can have unique attributes and create unique weapons that belong to you only!

There are also 2 kinds of game consoles in the game. After being placed, you can play mini games in the game. A "stupid bird fly", a "space warplane", the points can be directly converted into gold coins in the game, let you If you don’t leave home, you can also get rich.

There are a lot of tributes to the classic games and the eggs waiting for your excavation in the game~~
